summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2002 AUDI ALL ROAD. THE CONTACT NOTICED THAT THE HEADLIGHT AND SELF LEVELING LIGHT HAD ILLUMINATED ON THE INSTRUMENT PANEL.  AFTER HAVING A RECALL PERFORM ON HIS VEHICLE BY THE MANUFACTURER. HE DID NOT NOTICE ANY DIFFERENCES BEFORE HAND.  THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGE IS 82000.  THE CONSUMER STATED THE HEADLIGHTS STILL DO NOT WORK AND ALSO THE AIR BAG SUSPENSION DOES NOT WORK. UPDATED 10/26/09
